title: (x) The Sage, Gateshead signage type - Corporate S {Mike Y}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706170050im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/thesage_4414.jpg)

Many thanks

 [‹ "Invite" connected script typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706170050/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29999 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Overture flare serif - Friz Quadrata {Conor Nolan} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706170050/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30002 "Go to next forum topic")
author: edward maddison

comments.content:
I think this is Corporate S. I’ll find a link in a minute.

- Mike Yanega

This is the [Berthold version](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706170050/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/corporate-s-bq/). There is also one from URW. The typeface was designed by Kurt Weidemann.

- Mike Yanega
